meanings.definition: A person who is addicted to chocolate.
meanings.sent1: Chocoholics often crave chocolate throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: My friends are all chocoholics and love trying different types of chocolate desserts.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the chocoholics made a beeline for the chocolate fountain.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up like a chocoholic in a chocolate shop when she saw the display of truffles.
meanings.sent5: The chocoholics in the office always have a stash of chocolate bars in their desks.

meanings.sent1: The group of chocoholics went on a chocolate tasting tour together.
meanings.sent2: Chocoholics enjoy sharing their favorite chocolate treats with each other.
meanings.sent3: The chocoholics' meeting turned into a chocolate feast with everyone bringing their own chocolate creations.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter and chatter as the chocoholics exchanged chocolate recipes.
meanings.sent5: The chocoholics' club organized a chocolate-themed party for all chocolate lovers in the neighborhood.
